user_data.target_needs: I aimed to fulfill my need for stylish and comfortable clothing that would last, but both purchases failed to meet those expectations.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a comfortable and versatile clothing option that could be worn alone or layered. The promise of high-quality and long-lasting apparel at an affordable price was appealing. However, my experience was disappointing as the product did not meet my expectations in terms of durability, leading to a negative review.

I wanted a stylish top that would fit well and match my fashion sense. The description suggested a carefully crafted product, but upon receiving it, I found it to be completely different from what was advertised, which led to my dissatisfaction. The humor in my review reflects my surprise at the disparity between expectation and reality.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer clothing that is of good quality, durable, and fits well, especially for everyday use. I value items that are comfortable and easy to care for, such as those that wash well and maintain their shape over time. I appreciate classic styles that can be easily mixed and matched, and I tend to favor products that offer a good fit for my body type. On the other hand, I dislike items that feel cheap or poorly made, as well as those that have inconsistent sizing or fit awkwardly. I am particularly sensitive to clothing that is either too tight in some areas or too loose in others, as this affects my overall comfort and satisfaction with the product.
